text: allahu ninnalil cilare marru cilarekkal upajivanattinre karyattil meccappettavarakkiyirikkunnu. ennal (jivitattil) meccam labhiccavar tannalute upajivanam tannalute valatukaikal adhinappetuttiveccittullavar (atimakal) kk vittukeatukkukayum, annane upajivanattil avar (atimayum utamayum) tulyarakukayum ceyyunnilla. appeal allahuvinre anugrahatteyanea avar nisedhikkunnat
